name: delete_line_middle_of_region
description: DL in middle of scroll region shifts content up within region, blank at bottom
comment: Print A(0,0), B(1,0), C(2,0), D(3,0); CSI 2;4 r (region rows 1-3); CUP(3,1) -> (2,0) middle of region; DL(1) deletes row 2, D moves up to (2,0), blank at (3,0); cursor at (2,0)
